Service Details: - Men's organization that supports hospitals dedicated to improving children's lives by providing specialty pediatric care- Children up to the age of 18 with orthopedic conditions, burns, spinal cord injuries and cleft lip / palate receive free care- Provides free transportation to Shrine Hospitals in Washington and Oregon
Eligibility: Applicants for membership must be a member of a Shrine Temple
How to Apply: Contact the secretary or attend a meeting
Meetings: Every 3rd Mon: 6:30pm - 9pm @ St. George's Masonic Hall (1564 Pandosy St, Kelowna)
Address & Map: St. George's Masonic Hall1564 Pandosy StKelowna, BC     V1Y 1P4
